name: Bungee Bros. Demo
description:
Snap!

Badguys, Catguys, Snipguys, Voidguys, and Shroomguys have made your mountain their home.
Take control of the Brothers, Red and Blue and use your Bungee Cord to reclaim your mountain!

Wrap your Bungee Cord around tree stumps, and release it to snap enemies off the mountain!
Snap multiple enemies at once and hit other enemies with each other to increase your score combo

Watch out for Snipguys, as they can cut your Bungee Cord!
Max out your combo, and go for the high score!

-=Controls=-

ActionXboxSwitchPlayStationPlayer 1 Run:Left Trigger
ZLL2Player 1 Move:
Left Analogue Stick
Left Analogue StickLeft Analogue StickRope Hold:Left Button
LL1Player 2 Run:Right Trigger
ZRR2Player 2 Move:Right Analogue StickRight Analogue StickRight Analogue StickRope Hold:Right Button
RR1Confirm:ABX (Cross)
Back:XY▢ (Square)Pause:StartStartStart

Currently in development for PC.

Notice: Bungee Bros. requires a gamepad to play
